title: John Wall, Isaiah Thomas go all out for Halloween
text:
The Washington Wizards’ backcourt knows how to pull off a Halloween costume.

John Wall and Bradley Beal dressed up as different versions of the Joker at a recent Halloween party, while Isaiah Thomas, in a nod to his 5-foot-9 frame, showed up as an Oompa Loompa.

All three committed to the bit:

When Teach Me How To Dougie comes on, clear the dance floor for John Wall 🔥



(via kayla_jasmin_/IG) pic.twitter.com/bM1WXGY58G — Hoop District (@HoopDistrictDC) October 29, 2019

i cant stop thinking about bradley beal’s joker costume pic.twitter.com/Ks12JjzXs6 — whitney medworth (@its_whitney) October 29, 2019
